title: Reuters reveals Nord Stream gas pipeline will stay shut indefinitely; euro falls, gas prices soar
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters was first to report that Russia will keep the Nord Stream pipeline, which runs under the Baltic Sea to […]

The post Reuters reveals Nord Stream gas pipeline will stay shut indefinitely; euro falls, gas prices soar appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report that Russia will keep the Nord Stream pipeline, which runs under the Baltic Sea to Germany, shut beyond last week’s three-day maintenance halt, stoking up fears about shortages and gas rationing in the European Union this winter. The euro fell 0.74% to the dollar in the hour after the news and was testing a two-decade low on Monday when European gas prices jumped as much as 30%.

The post Reuters reveals Nord Stream gas pipeline will stay shut indefinitely; euro falls, gas prices soar appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
